EmailTemplate.name: Exam partial pass notification - pass FG
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You passed the Fundamentals of Geology exam but didn’t pass the Practice of Geology exam.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You took two exams on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}.
You passed the Fundamentals of Geology exam but didn't pass the Practice of Geology exam.
You must pass both exams to get your license.
You may take the Practice of Geology exam again. Go to our website to see next exam dates and deadlines.
Register for the exam through our new online system:
Go to {!Education_History__c.License_Portal_URL__c}. Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
To register for the exam by mail:
Fill out the Geologist and/or Specialty License Reexam Registration (pdf) form Print completed form Include payment for the exam fee Mail completed form and payment to the address on the form
You may use the “Geologist-in-Training” title until you meet all requirements for a license.
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP018
